name: Testimonial Carousel For Elementor
author: UAPP GROUP

sections.description:
The compact Testimonial Carousel for Elementor lets you show long text reviews in Pop-Up of Carousel Slider. Now you can easily show your long reviews using this plugin to your users as a Pop-Up from the Review Card. But without overloading the site with long texts.
The plugin has many features and settings to customize the reviews to suit your needs.

COMMON FEATURES

  • Create an unlimited number of reviews with images and rating
  • Customize Reviews, including Slider Settings, Autoplay, and Autoplay Speed, Navigation
  • Customize General Styles, such as Background type, Rating icon size, Rating icon spacing, Rating icon color, Rating unmarked icon color, Border width, Border color
  • Slider style customizing, for example Name color, Name typography, Edit Title color, Title typography, Edit Content color, Content typography, Edit “Read more” button color, “Read more” button typography
  • Change Popup Styles including Name color, Name typography, Title color, Title typography, Content color, Content typography
  • Navigation styles customizing, such as Arrows and Pagination settings
  • Advanced settings of the Slider with possibility to change Layout, Motion Effects, Transformation, Background, Border, Mask, Attributes, Custom CSS

AI FUTURES

  • Added the ability to generate all text content for reviews directly into the plugin fields in the Elementor.

REASONS FOR CHOOSING TESTIMONIAL CAROUSEL FOR ELEMENTOR

An easy to use interface with several customization and unique essential widgets make your next WordPress page, post design easier than ever before. Testimonial Carousel for Elementor page builders take your WordPress website to the next level by making your page more eye-catching.

EXPERT SUPPORT

We have an extraordinary support team ready to help you. You can ask your questions in the support forum
sections.installation:
Note : This plugin works with Elementor. Make sure you have Elementor installed.

  1. Download “Testimonial Carousel for Elementor” plugin
  2. Simply go to the Plugins page, then click on Add new and select the plugin’s .zip file which is “testimonials-carousel-elementor.zip”.
  3. Alternatively you can extract the contents of the zip file directly to your wp-content/plugins/ folder
  4. Finally, activate the plugin.
  5. You can find widgets in “Testimonial Carousel” widget list panel.
sections.changelog:
10.1.0 – 2024-04-10

  • New: Added Template for “Creative Carousel”.

10.0.0 – 2024-04-04

  • New: Added a new “Cube 360”.
  • New: Added a new section “Section With Cube 360”.

9.4.0 – 2024-03-28

  • New: Added a new “Creative Carousel”.
  • New: Added “Live Preview”.

9.3.0 – 2024-03-15

  • New: Added new fields for setting up overlay for Cube Carousel.
  • New: Added new fields for setting up overlay for Section With Cube Carousel.

9.2.0 – 2024-03-05

  • New: Added a new category “Section With Carousel”.
  • New: Added a new section “Section With Cube Carousel”.

9.1.0 – 2024-02-29

  • New: Changed icons for widgets.
  • Modified: Date display in Changelog changed.

9.0.0 – 2024-02-27

  • New: Added a new Cube Carousel.
  • New: Added a new category “3D Animated Carousel”.

8.0.1 – 2024-02-20

  • Fix: Fixed incorrect behavior of the plugin with standard Elementor sliders.

8.0.0 – 2024-01-25

  • New: Added a new Testimonials Carousel with Blog.
  • New: Testimonials Carousel with Rating: Added border and box-shadow controls of image and card and modal.
  • New: Testimonials Carousel with Logo: Added border and box-shadow controls of image and card and modal.
  • New: Testimonials Carousel with Rating Centered: Added border and box-shadow controls of image and card and modal.
  • New: Testimonials Carousel with Centered Slides: Added border and box-shadow controls of image and card and modal.

7.1.0 – 2023-10-31

  • New: Added a new field on the “Additional Options” for the setting limit the line text.

7.0.0 – 2023-08-18

  • New: Added a new Testimonials Carousel with Employees.
  • Fix: Fixed the active dots on the carousel.

6.2.2 – 2023-08-10

  • Fix: Fixed the slice of elements in the slider.

6.2.1 – 2023-08-08

  • Fix: Fixed the conflict between the style of the plugin with Elementor libs.
  • Fix: Fixed the show Elementor AI in the fields.

6.2.0 – 2023-08-04

  • New: Added checking Elementor settings for Upgrade Swiper Library ( Elementor->Features->Upgrade Swiper Library (Switch to “Default” or “Active”) ).

6.1.2 – 2023-07-25

  • New: Added a new field “Loop” in the “Additional Options” for sliders.
  • Fix: Fixed the space between paragraphs the content slider.

6.1.1 – 2023-07-12

  • Fix: Fixed the word break for the content slider.

6.1.0 – 2023-06-29

  • New: Added the fields for alignment of the content on the sliders.
  • New: Added the fields for setting the popup for sliders.

6.0.0 – 2023-06-21

  • New: Added a new Testimonials Carousel with Gallery Coverflow.
  • Fix: Fixed the logic auto scroll after closing the pop-up.
  • Fix: Fixed the logic of the scroll when opening the pop-up at the click button “Read More”.

5.0.0 – 2023-06-15

  • New: Added a new Carousel with Coverflow.
  • New: Added the button for validation API-Key for GPT (Elementor->Settings->General).
  • New: Added notification on GPT response error.
  • Fix: Fixed display of button “Read More”.

4.1.0 – 2023-05-19

  • New: The GPT chat functionality was added for writing testimonials on different topics.
  • New: Added a field to the Elementor->Settings->General.
  • Fix: Fixed display of placeholder images for sliders.
  • Fix: Fixed display of default elements for sliders when adding a slider to a page.

4.0.1 – 2022-07-22

  • Fix: Changed bunner.
  • Fix: Changed stable version of plugin.

4.0.0 – 2022-07-13

  • New: Added Testimonial Carousel with Centered Slides.

3.0.0 – 2022-07-07

  • New: Added Testimonial Carousel with Rating Centered Widget.

2.0.0 – 2022-07-04

  • New: Added Testimonial Carousel with Logo Widget.
  • Fix: Fixed styles of the popup when adding several carousels to the same page.
  • Fix: Fixed failed opening required ‘widgets/class-testimonialscarousel-logo.php’.

1.1.0 – 2022-06-22

  • New: Added the ability to hide the rating if it is not selected.

1.0.1 – 2022-06-21

  • Fix: Fixed correct work of the plugin when adding several carousels to the same page.
  • Fix: Changed stable version of plugin.

1.0.0

  • Initial Release

sections.reviews:
Works as Advertised with Great Support for Tweaking

By rightstuffwebdev on July 19, 2023

Tried several plugins to get a testimonial carousel up and working, but none met my needs as well as this one. It was easy to get up and running and looks great. I love the preview vs. pop-out. I had a little formatting issue and posted in the forum where the customer support responded quickly and worked with me to sort the issue out. Very pleased.
